about_the_game:
Witness the birth of the video game that you have played before. This DLC contains the original version of the play that was performed in high school, reimagined as one of Starter's fever dreams, taking place before the swordfight.

The high school draft was written in high school. That was quite some time ago. So not everything is going to be completely accurate to something written a million years ago.

To access this masterpiece:

- At start, click on SIMPLY WATCH A PLAY.

- The sequence will begin after Act II, Scene I (Shakespeare's attic).

short_description: The version of the play, The Ghost of Joe Papp, that was cultivated in high school. At least, the parts that the author can remember. 50% OF SALES GO TOWARDS THE AMERICAN KIDNEY FUND.
